xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/783370-Better Day 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cXBFgN0NgLFGaKqd1vQExMpF1Yl.jpg It's a new day for the Gaither Vocal Band! This exciting musical celebration, filmed before an enthusiastic live audience at the Majestic Theatre in San Antonio, Texas, offers a DVD debut of the group's brand new, all-star lineup featuring the voices of: Michael English, Wes Hampton, Mark Lowry, David Phelps and Bill Gaither...plus wonderful guest performances by The Isaacs and Jason Crabb. Better Day
